name: Asylum 7
description:
Asylum 7 is a 3D first-person horror game with puzzles inside. Players have to survive in the darkness with lasers in their hands to control the lighting, attack the zombies, and find their way out. Save energy from the lighting lamp to survive longer!

Dev Team:

Programming: Siyi Chen, Ruipu Li, Zhongqian Duan, Yigao Fang, Dawei Wang

Music: Keshav Akella

Dev Blog:

https://www.indiedb.com/members/chicychen/blogs/asylum-7-gold-version-released#a...

https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=73275.0

Link to play online:
